name: Posts Release By Timing
author: Chen Lei

sections.description:
Posts Release By Timing Plugin achieve the “draft” posts in some categories timing and quantitative release by setting release time and release amount/number.
it need used together with “WP Missed Schedule Fix Failed Future Posts” Plugin which decided the timing posts release amounts and time.

Development Blog

ChenLei WordPress Plugin Development Page
sections.installation:
1. Upload posts-release-by-timing.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Option it in admin posts menu section
sections.faq:
why it need worked together with “WP Missed Schedule Fix Failed Future Posts” Plugin

it all reason is that avoid to realize same function repetition.
